news_header: WPC TV, a new global real estate news streaming service, is set to launch in late 2025, offering extensive programming and expert interviews.
news_text: WORLD PROPERTY CHANNEL TV (WPC TV) has announced its plans to launch a global real estate news streaming service by late 2025. The platform will provide 6 to 8 hours of daily real estate news programming, featuring in-depth market coverage and interviews with experts across various sectors. Based in Miami, with additional offices planned in Los Angeles and New York City, WPC TV aims to capitalize on the growing demand for specialized streaming services. The company is preparing for a $200 million funding round and plans to build a 20,000-square-foot broadcast center in Miami. Founder Michael Gerrity envisions WPC TV as the 'CNBC of Real Estate' delivered online.
